languages.text: {n}Коротко переглянувшись с напарником, человек кладет руку на оружие.{/n} "Обещал жене месяц пожить без убийств... но увы. Лучше нарушить слово, чем подставиться под гнев Владайма".

{n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than get on the Liege's bad side."
languages.original_text: {n}Коротко переглянувшись с напарником, человек кладет руку на оружие.{/n} "Обещал жене месяц пожить без убийств... но увы. Лучше нарушить слово, чем подставиться под гнев Владайма".

traits.locale_text: {n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than piss off Vladaym."
{n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than piss off Vladaym."

{n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than get on the Liege's bad side."

{n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than get on the Liege's bad side."

{n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than get on the Liege's bad side."

languages.text: {n}那个男人瞥了一眼他的伙伴，之后将一只手搭在武器上。{/n}“我答应过我老婆一个月不杀人……真是太遗憾了。我宁可食言，也不想被总督盯上。”
languages.original_text: {n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than get on the Liege's bad side."

traits.locale_text: {n}那个男人瞥了一眼他的伙伴，之后将一只手搭在武器上。{/n}“我答应过我老婆一个月不杀人……真是太遗憾了。我宁可食言，也不想被总督盯上。”

languages.text: {n}Tras mirar brevemente a su socio, el hombre se lleva la mano al arma.{/n} «Le prometí a mi mujer que podría aguantar un mes sin matar a nadie... lástima. Pero prefiero romper mi palabra a acabar en el lado malo del Señor».
languages.original_text: {n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than get on the Liege's bad side."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras mirar brevemente a su socio, el hombre se lleva la mano al arma.{/n} «Le prometí a mi mujer que podría aguantar un mes sin matar a nadie... lástima. Pero prefiero romper mi palabra a acabar en el lado malo del Señor».

languages.text: {n}仲間をちらりと見た後、男は武器に手を伸ばした。{/n}「嫁には1ヶ月は人殺しをしないと誓ったんだが…仕方ねえ。リージュの機嫌を損ねるくらいなら約束を破ったほうがマシだ」
languages.original_text: {n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than get on the Liege's bad side."

traits.locale_text: {n}仲間をちらりと見た後、男は武器に手を伸ばした。{/n}「嫁には1ヶ月は人殺しをしないと誓ったんだが…仕方ねえ。リージュの機嫌を損ねるくらいなら約束を破ったほうがマシだ」

languages.text: {n}Nach einem kurzen Blick auf seinen Partner legt der Mann eine Hand auf seine Waffe.{/n} "Ich habe meiner Frau versprochen, ich würde einen Monat lang niemanden umbringen ... Pech gehabt. Lieber breche ich mein Wort, als den Unmut des Lehnsherren zu erregen."
languages.original_text: {n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than get on the Liege's bad side."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einem kurzen Blick auf seinen Partner legt der Mann eine Hand auf seine Waffe.{/n} "Ich habe meiner Frau versprochen, ich würde einen Monat lang niemanden umbringen ... Pech gehabt. Lieber breche ich mein Wort, als den Unmut des Lehnsherren zu erregen."

languages.text: {n}Après avoir jeté un bref coup d'œil à son partenaire, l'homme pose une main sur la crosse de son arme.{/n} « Dire que j'avais promis à ma femme de ne tuer personne ce mois-ci... Mais je préfère trahir ma parole plutôt que de me mettre le suzerain à dos. »
languages.original_text: {n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than get on the Liege's bad side."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir jeté un bref coup d'œil à son partenaire, l'homme pose une main sur la crosse de son arme.{/n} « Dire que j'avais promis à ma femme de ne tuer personne ce mois-ci... Mais je préfère trahir ma parole plutôt que de me mettre le suzerain à dos. »

languages.text: {n}Adam, meslektaşına şöyle bir bakıp elini silahının üstüne koyuyor.{/n} "Bir ay öldürmek yok diye karıma söz vermiştim. Yazık olacak. Emîr'in gözünden düşmektense sözümden dönmeyi yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: {n}After glancing briefly at his partner, the man lays a hand on his weapon.{/n} "I promised my wife I could go a month without murder... too bad. I'd rather break my word than get on the Liege's bad side."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam, meslektaşına şöyle bir baktıktan sonra elini silahına götürüyor.{/n} "Bir ay öldürmek yok, diye karıma söz vermiştim... Yazık olacak. Emîr'in gözünden düşmektense sözümden dönmeyi yeğlerim."
